trans-unit.source: Listens for connections from TCP network clients.
trans-unit.target: 侦听来自 TCP 网络客户端连接。

trans-unit.source: The TcpListener class provides simple methods that listen for and accept incoming connection requests in blocking synchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: TcpListener 类提供侦听和接受传入连接请求，在阻止同步模式的简单方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use either a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> or a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to connect with a TcpListener.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>使用 TcpListener 进行连接。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: Create a TcpListener using an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>, a Local IP address and port number, or just a port number.
trans-unit.target: 创建 TcpListener 使用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>，本地 IP 地址和端口号或只是端口号。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: Specify <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any> for the local IP address and 0 for the local port number if you want the underlying service provider to assign those values for you.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any>本地 IP 地址和本地端口号，如果你想要为您分配这些值的基础服务提供程序为 0。</xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any>

trans-unit.source: If you choose to do this, you can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property to identify the assigned information, after the socket has connected.
trans-unit.target: 如果你选择这样做，则可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>属性来标识已指定的信息后套接字连接。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法，以开始侦听传入连接请求。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> will queue incoming connections until you either call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method or it has queued <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>将队列传入连接，直到你调用的<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法或它已排队<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A></xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use either <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> to pull a connection from the incoming connection request queue.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用两种<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>请求从传入的连接请求队列的连接。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: These two methods will block.
trans-unit.target: 将阻止这两种方法。

trans-unit.source: If you want to avoid blocking, you can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method first to determine if connection requests are available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要避免阻止，则可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法首先确定连接请求是否可在队列中。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method to close the TcpListener.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法来关闭 TcpListener。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method does not close any accepted connections.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法不会关闭任何已接受的连接。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for closing these separately.
trans-unit.target: 你负责分别关闭这些连接。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> class that listens on the specified port.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>在指定端口侦听的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数已废弃不用。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPAddress%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPAddress%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName>构造函数。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPEndPoint%29?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.%23ctor%28System.Net.IPAddress%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify the port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数，可指定用于侦听传入的连接尝试的端口号。

trans-unit.source: With this constructor, the underlying service provider assigns the most appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数，基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local port is used, you can specify 0 for the port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，则可以指定的端口号 0。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配 1024年和 5000 之间可用的端口号。

trans-unit.source: If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此方法时，你可能会发现已使用分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口数量<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>属性。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法，以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: The port on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 要传入的连接尝试的侦听端口。

trans-unit.source: port is not between and .
trans-unit.target: port不介于和。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> class with the specified local endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>与指定的本地终结点的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor allows you to specify the local IP address and port number on which to listen for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数允许你指定的本地 IP 地址和端口号用于侦听传入的连接尝试。

trans-unit.source: Before using this constructor, you must create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using the desired local IP address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数之前，必须创建<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用所需的本地 IP 地址和端口号。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: Pass this <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> to the constructor as the `localEP` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 将此传递<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>到构造函数、 作为`localEP`参数。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local address is assigned, you can create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using <xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=fullName> as the address parameter, and the underlying service provider will assign the most appropriate network address.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不关心哪些本地地址分配，你可以创建<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用<xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=fullName>地址参数，以及基础服务提供程序将分配的最合适的网络地址。</xref:System.Net.IPAddress.Any?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: This might help simplify your application if you have multiple network interfaces.
trans-unit.target: 这可能有助于简化你的应用程序，如果你有多个网络接口。

trans-unit.source: If you do not care which local port is used, you can create an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> using 0 for the port number.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不关心使用哪个本地端口，则可以创建<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>使用 0 作为端口号。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: In this case, the service provider will assign an available port number between 1024 and 5000.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，服务提供商将分配 1024年和 5000 之间可用的端口号。

trans-unit.source: If you use this approach, you can discover what local network address and port number has been assigned by using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此方法时，你可能会发现已使用分配了哪些本地网络地址和端口数量<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>属性。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.LocalEndpoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法，以开始侦听传入的连接尝试。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: Accepts a pending connection request.
trans-unit.target: 接受挂起的连接请求。

trans-unit.source: AcceptSocket is a blocking method that returns a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: AcceptSocket 是返回一个阻止方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>可用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If you want to avoid blocking, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A> method to determine if connection requests are available in the incoming connection queue.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想要避免阻止，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>方法来确定是否可在传入的连接队列连接请求。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Pending%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>返回初始化与远程主机的 IP 地址和端口号。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: You can use any of the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> methods available in the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> class to communicate with the remote host.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用任一<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A>方法中提供<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>类与远程主机通信。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Receive%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, be sure to call its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，一定要调用其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If your application is relatively simple, consider using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method rather than the AcceptSocket method.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法，而不是 AcceptSocket 方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> provides you with simple methods for sending and receiving data over a network in blocking synchronous mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>用于发送和接收数据通过阻止同步模式下的网络提供了简单的方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>

trans-unit.source: Accepts a pending connection request as an asynchronous operation.

trans-unit.source: This operation will not block.
trans-unit.target: 不会阻止此操作。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> object will complete after the socket connection has been accepted.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>对象都完成后的套接字连接已被接受。</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned in <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task%601> is initialized with the IP address and port number of the remote host.

trans-unit.source: When you are finished using the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, be sure to call its <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>，一定要调用其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.Close%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序相对简单，请考虑使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法，而不是 AcceptSocketAsync 方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> is actively listening for client connections.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>主动侦听客户端连接。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> can use this property to determine if the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is currently listening for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>可以使用此属性来确定如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>程序当前正在侦听传入的连接尝试。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A> property can be used to avoid redundant <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A>属性可以用于避免冗余<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>尝试。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.Active%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> is actively listening; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>主动侦听; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Enables or disables Network Address Translation (NAT) traversal on a <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 启用或禁用在网络地址转换 (NAT) 遍历<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>实例。

trans-unit.source: The AllowNatTraversal method is used to enable or disable NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: AllowNatTraversal 方法用于启用或禁用的 NAT 遍历<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>实例。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: NAT traversal may be provided using Teredo, 6to4, or an ISATAP tunnel.
trans-unit.target: 可能使用 Teredo、 6to4 或 ISATAP 隧道提供 NAT 遍历。

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is false, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 当`allowed`参数为 false，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>关联的套接字上的选项设置为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>

trans-unit.source: This explicitly disables NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> instance.
trans-unit.target: 这将显式禁止 NAT 遍历<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>实例。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: When the `allowed` parameter is true, the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName> option on the associated socket is set to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 当`allowed`参数为 true，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>关联的套接字上的选项设置为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.IPProtectionLevel> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName>

trans-unit.source: This may allow NAT traversal for a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> depending on firewall rules in place on the system.
trans-unit.target: 这可能使 NAT 遍历<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>具体取决于系统上实施防火墙规则。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: The AllowNatTraversal method must be invoked prior to calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method to begin listening for incoming connection requests (before the socket is bound).
trans-unit.target: 必须在调用之前调用的 AllowNatTraversal 方法<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法，以开始侦听传入的连接请求 （之前不会绑定套接字）。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If AllowNatTraversal method is called after the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method, then an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AllowNatTraversal 方法后，会调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法，则<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>将引发。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Teredo address is an IPv6 address with the prefix of 2001::/32.
trans-unit.target: Teredo 地址是 IPv6 地址的前缀为 2001年:: / 32。

trans-unit.source: Teredo addresses can be returned through normal DNS name resolution or enumerated as an IPv6 address assigned to a local interface.
trans-unit.target: Teredo 地址可以返回通过正常的 DNS 名称解析或枚举为分配给了本地接口的 IPv6 地址。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that specifies whether to enable or disable NAT traversal.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，指定是否启用或禁用 NAT 遍历。

trans-unit.source: The AllowNatTraversal method was called after calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start*> method
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start*>方法</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start*>之后调用了 AllowNatTraversal 方法

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to accept an incoming connection attempt.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个异步操作以接受传入的连接尝试。

trans-unit.source: The asynchronous BeginAcceptSocket operation must be completed by calling the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 必须通过调用完成异步 BeginAcceptSocket 操作<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptSocket%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.EndAcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the method is invoked by the `callback` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，通过调用该方法`callback`委托。

trans-unit.source: This method does not block until the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会阻止该操作完成之前。

trans-unit.source: To block until the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止该操作完成之前，请使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously accepts an incoming connection attempt and creates a new <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to handle remote host communication.
trans-unit.target: 异步接受传入的连接尝试，并创建一个新<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>来处理远程主机通信。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 此方法受到阻止，直到操作完成。

trans-unit.source: To perform this operation synchronously, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式执行此操作，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You can call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to identify the remote host's network address and port number.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 可以调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>来标识远程主机的网络地址和端口号。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.RemoteEndPoint%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you receive a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 如果你收到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来获取特定的错误代码和在 MSDN 库中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档是指[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)有关错误的详细说明。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"></xref> used to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient"> </xref>用于发送和接收数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> allows only one underlying socket to listen to a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref:System.Boolean>值，该值指定是否<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>允许只有一个基础套接字侦听特定端口</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: By default, multiple listeners can listen to a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，多个侦听器可以侦听特定端口。

trans-unit.source: However, only one of the listeners can perform operations on the network traffic sent to the port.
trans-unit.target: 但是，只有一个侦听器可以执行网络流量发送到端口的操作。

trans-unit.source: If more than one listener attempts to bind to a particular port, then the one with the more specific IP address handles the network traffic sent to that port.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个侦听器尝试将绑定到特定端口，则采用更具体的 IP 地址处理发送到该端口的网络流量。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A> property to prevent multiple listeners from listening to a specific port.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>属性可避免多个侦听器侦听特定端口。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set this property before calling <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>, or call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method and then set this property.
trans-unit.target: 将之前调用此属性设置<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>，或调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法并将此属性。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> allows only one <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> to listen to a specific port; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>只允许一个<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>以侦听特定端口; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> for Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP Service Pack 2 and later, and <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> for all other versions.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>为 Windows Server 2003 和 Windows XP Service Pack 2 及更高版本，和<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>对于所有其他版本。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref> has been started.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"> </xref>已启动。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop"></xref> method and then set the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse*> property.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop"></xref>方法，然后设置<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse*>属性。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket.ExclusiveAddressUse*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when attempting to access the underlying socket.
trans-unit.target: 在尝试访问基础套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>已关闭。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> of the current <xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>的当前<xref href="System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener"> </xref>。</xref:System.Net.EndPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can use the LocalEndpoint property to identify the local network interface and port number being used to listen for incoming client connection requests, after a socket connection has been made.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 LocalEndpoint 属性来标识用于侦听传入的客户端连接请求，套接字连接后的本地网络接口和端口号。

trans-unit.source: You must first cast this <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> to an <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>.
trans-unit.target: 你必须首先转换此<xref:System.Net.EndPoint>到<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint>。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint> </xref:System.Net.EndPoint>

trans-unit.source: You can then call the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the local IP address, and the <xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to retrieve the local port number.
trans-unit.target: 然后，你可以调用<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来检索本地 IP 地址，与<xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来检索本地端口号。</xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Port%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.IPEndPoint.Address%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.EndPoint> to which the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is bound.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.EndPoint>到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>绑定。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.EndPoint>

trans-unit.source: Determines if there are pending connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否存在挂起的连接请求。

trans-unit.source: This non-blocking method determines if there are any pending connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 此非阻止方法确定是否有任何挂起的连接请求。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> methods block execution until the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method has queued an incoming connection request, the Pending method can be used to determine if connections are available before attempting to accept them.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法阻止执行，直到<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法已排队的传入连接请求，挂起的方法可以用于确定连接之前尝试接受这些条款是否可用。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if connections are pending; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果连接处于挂起状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The listener has not been started with a call to <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start*>.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start*>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start*>尚未启动侦听器

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying network <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础网络<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> creates a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> to listen for incoming client connection requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>创建<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>侦听传入的客户端连接请求。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket></xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> can use this property to get this <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>可以使用此属性来获取此<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket></xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>从派生的类

trans-unit.source: Use the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> returned by the Server property if you require access beyond that which <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> provides.
trans-unit.target: 使用基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>由服务器属性，如果你要求在超出其<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>提供。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Server property only returns the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> used to listen for incoming client connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 的服务器属性只返回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用来侦听传入的客户端连接请求。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法接受挂起的连接请求并获取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method to accept a pending connection request and obtain a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法接受挂起的连接请求并获取<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>.</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Starts listening for incoming connection requests.
trans-unit.target: 开始侦听传入连接请求。

trans-unit.source: The Start method initializes the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: Start 方法初始化基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、 将其绑定到的本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: If a connection request is received, the Start method will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到连接请求时，启动方法将对请求进行排队，并继续侦听其他的请求，直到你调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections, it will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>接收连接请求它已排入队列的最大连接数后，它会引发<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>客户端上。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从传入的连接队列中删除的连接，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method will remove a connection from the queue and return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法将从队列删除的连接并返回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>可用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that you can use to do the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法将返回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>可用于执行相同操作。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序仅需要同步 I/O，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more detailed behavioral control, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 对于更多详细行为的控件，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 连接请求队列中出现一直进行阻止这两种方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> and stop listening.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法来关闭<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>并停止侦听。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately.
trans-unit.target: 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来获取特定的错误代码。

trans-unit.source: When you have obtained this code, you can refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in MSDN for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 当你已获得此代码时，你可以参考 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档 MSDN 中有关错误的详细说明。

trans-unit.source: Starts listening for incoming connection requests with a maximum number of pending connection.
trans-unit.target: 开始侦听传入连接请求使用的最大挂起连接数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> method initializes the underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>, binds it to a local endpoint, and listens for incoming connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>方法初始化基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>、 将其绑定到的本地终结点，并侦听传入的连接尝试。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If a connection request is received, <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A> will queue the request and continue listening for additional requests until you call the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到连接请求时，<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>将对请求进行排队并继续侦听其他的请求，直到你调用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Start%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> receives a connection request after it has already queued the maximum number of connections it will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> on the client.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>接收连接请求之后它已排入队列的最大，它将引发的连接数,<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>客户端上。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>

trans-unit.source: To remove a connection from the incoming connection queue, use either the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method or the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要从传入的连接队列中删除的连接，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法或<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A> method will remove a connection from the queue and return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> that you can use to send and receive data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>方法将从队列删除的连接并返回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>可用于发送和接收数据。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method will return a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> that you can use to do the same.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法将返回<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>可用于执行相同操作。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application only requires synchronous I/O, use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序仅需要同步 I/O，使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptTcpClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more detailed behavioral control, use <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细行为的控件，请使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>方法。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.AcceptSocket%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both of these methods block until a connection request is available in the queue.
trans-unit.target: 连接请求队列中出现一直进行阻止这两种方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A> method to close the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> and stop listening.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>方法来关闭<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>并停止侦听。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> </xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener.Stop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately.
trans-unit.target: 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to obtain the specific error code and refer to the Windows Sockets version 2 API error code documentation in the MSDN library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/) for a detailed description of the error.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> 使用<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性来获取特定的错误代码和在 MSDN 库中的 Windows 套接字版本 2 API 错误代码文档是指[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/)有关错误的详细说明。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException.ErrorCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时你的应用程序中启用网络跟踪，此成员将输出跟踪信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The maximum length of the pending connections queue.
trans-unit.target: 挂起的连接队列的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while accessing the socket.
trans-unit.target: 访问套接字时出错。

trans-unit.source: See the Remarks section for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅备注部分以了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: The backlog parameter is less than zero or exceeds the maximum number of permitted connections.
trans-unit.target: backlog 参数小于零或超出最大允许的连接数。

trans-unit.source: The underlying <xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket> is null.
trans-unit.target: 基础<xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>为 null。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.Socket>

trans-unit.source: Closes the listener.
trans-unit.target: 关闭侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Stop closes the listener.
trans-unit.target: 停止关闭侦听器。

trans-unit.source: Any unaccepted connection requests in the queue will be lost.
trans-unit.target: 在队列中的任何不可接受的连接请求将会丢失。

trans-unit.source: Remote hosts waiting for a connection to be accepted will throw a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>.
trans-unit.target: 远程主机等待连接接受将引发一种<xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>。</xref:System.Net.Sockets.SocketException>

trans-unit.source: You are responsible for closing your accepted connections separately.
trans-unit.target: 你负责分别关闭所接受的连接。
